alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 7:56AM CDT until May 11 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Olmsted County in southeastern Minnesota... Northeastern Dodge County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 755 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pine Island, or 7 miles northeast of Mantorville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pine Island around 805 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Concord, Highway 57 And 570th Street, Berne and Genoa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
